name: Republic of Buenos Aires
startIntroPart2: They think I'm federal; No sir, I am not from any party but from the country... In short, all I want is to avoid evils and reestablish the institutions, but I am sorry that they have brought me to this position!!
defeated: The Red One will never die!
introduction: Greetings, I am Restaurateur Juan Manuel de Rosas. I am the Governor of the Province of Buenos Aires, I am the Great Leader of the Pampean plain.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
